summary: A group of young friends make an incomprehensible discovery in an abandoned mine, but the more they try to change the future, the more they seal their fate.
cast: Joseph Cross|Briana Evigan|Rafi Gavron|Julianna Guill|Alex Meraz|Diane Duca|Ethan Peck|Rebecca Da Costa|Michael Guillod|Lindsay Lamb|Duane Loken
title: Mine Games
